description: Foes' damage taken is increased by 6% for each debuff they are inflicted with, up to 30%.
name: Debuff Domain

description: Party's Curse damage is increased by 20%.
name: Curse +

description: Party's Fire damage is increased by 20%.
name: Fire +

description: Party's Wind damage is increased by 20%.
name: Wind +

description: Party's Ice damage is increased by 20%.
name: Ice +

description: Party's Electric damage is increased by 20%.
name: Electric +

description: Party's Psy damage is increased by 20%.
name: Psy +

description: Party's Nuclear damage is increased by 20%.
name: Nuclear +

description: Party's Bless damage is increased by 20%.
name: Bless +

description: Party's Gun damage is increased by 20%.
name: Gun +

description: Party's Physical damage is increased by 20%.
name: Physical +

description:
At the end of each turn, foes gain 1 Berserk stack.
Berserk: Increase damage by a set amount. Stacks up to 3 times.
name: Berserk

description: If the party contains Guardians or Medics, all foes' final damage dealt is decreased by 60% and final damage taken is increased by 20%. If not, all foes' final damage dealt is increased by 60%.
name: Gurdians & Medics

description: Sweeper allies' damage is increased by 20%.
name: Sweeper +

description: Assassin allies' damage is increased by 20%.
name: Assassin +

description: Foes' damage taken is increased by 10% for each elemental ailment they have, up to 40%.
name: Elemental Ailment

description: Allies are unable to deal critical hits, but deal increased final damage from skills and Resonances. This increase is equal to critical hit rate x (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).
name: Critical Stability

description:
After the boss takes an action, all allies are inflicted with Intimidation. When Intimidation is removed, all foes are inflicted with Intimidation.
Intimidation: Defense decreases by 10%, up to 50%.
name: Intimidation

description: When any ally receives healing, their final damage is increased by 8%. Lasts for 2 turns. Stacks up to 4 times.
name: Healing
